LGTM On Sunday, January 1, 2012, wrote: > Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com, > > Message: > Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, > > I'd like you to review this change to > https://go.googlecode.com/hg/ > > > Description: > doc/articles: add {{donotedit}} to templates > > Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/5502088/ > > Affected files: > M doc/articles/defer_panic_recover.html > M doc/articles/defer_panic_recover.tmpl > M doc/articles/error_handling.html > M doc/articles/error_handling.tmpl > > > Index: doc/articles/defer_panic_recover.html > =================================================================== > --- a/doc/articles/defer_panic_recover.html > +++ b/doc/articles/defer_panic_recover.html > @@ -1,4 +1,8 @@ > > + > >

> Go has the usual mechanisms for control flow: if, for, switch, goto. It also > Index: doc/articles/defer_panic_recover.tmpl > =================================================================== > --- a/doc/articles/defer_panic_recover.tmpl > +++ b/doc/articles/defer_panic_recover.tmpl > @@ -1,5 +1,5 @@ > > - > +{{donotedit}} >

> Go has the usual mechanisms for control flow: if, for, switch, goto. It also > has the go statement to run code in a separate goroutine. Here I'd like to > Index: doc/articles/error_handling.html > =================================================================== > --- a/doc/articles/error_handling.html > +++ b/doc/articles/error_handling.html > @@ -1,4 +1,8 @@ > > + > >

> If you have written any Go code you have probably encountered the built-in > Index: doc/articles/error_handling.tmpl > =================================================================== > --- a/doc/articles/error_handling.tmpl > +++ b/doc/articles/error_handling.tmpl > @@ -1,5 +1,5 @@ > > - > +{{donotedit}} >

> If you have written any Go code you have probably encountered the built-in > error type. Go code uses error values to > > >

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=12f6f46c5e18 ***

doc/articles: add {{donotedit}} to templates

R=golang-dev, adg
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5502088

Committer: Andrew Gerrand <adg@golang.org>

subject: code review 5502088: doc/articles: add {{donotedit}} to templates
